Improvements.Improvement: Replace if-else chain with a map
Improvements.Change_Diff:
- if (clazz == ArmorStand.class) { ... } else if (clazz == ExperienceOrb.class) { ... } ... else if (clazz == LeashHitch.class) { ... } 
+ return entityMockMap.getOrDefault(clazz, () -> { throw new UnimplementedOperationException(); }).apply(server, UUID.randomUUID());
Improvements.Description: The long if-else chain could be replaced by a map that maps classes to their corresponding mock entities. This would make the code cleaner, easier to read, and easier to maintain. It would also improve performance because map lookups are faster than iterating through a long list of conditions.
